page.title: 18GARDENS:NORTH NORFOLK
page.content: Shopping threatens to become a necessary evil of modern life, rather than a relaxed social outing, as it was in days gone by. {GARDENS ON THE NORFOLK COAST } It is not easy to describe a typical garden in this area,they vary greatly in size.Some of the old cottages have little more than a back yard.There are how ever several of about a quarter of an acre.Most people in the village grow vegetables,some being almost self supporting.However,the old pattern of the man of the house growing vegetables in the back garden whilst his wife grew flowers in the front is changing,particularly in the new houses is given to ornament rather than to utility.Acquisition of plants, as everywhere a great deal of exchanging of plants goes on in the area,and plants stalls are popular.
